alert.note: Alert for Harnett (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:05PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL HARNETT AND SOUTHWESTERN WAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EST... At 405 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lillington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Lillington, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, RDU International, Apex, Holly Springs, and Morrisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central North Carolina.
